title: RBI cancels licence of Karnataka-based Shimsha Sahakara Bank Niyamitha
description: The RBI has cancelled the licence of Shimsha Sahakara Bank in Karnataka due to financial troubles. Depositors can claim up to Rs 5 lakh from DICGC. The bank's closure is deemed necessary to protect depositor interests.
